Title: Câ€™s birthday...
<p>Hello there, lovelies~</p><p>So as some of you may know, Câ€™s birthday was recently (Feburary 14th). Unfortunately&hellip; An ice storm put us without power from the 12th to the 16th. Meaning we spent not only his birthday, but all of the days around it in the darkness and the cold.</p><p><b>C has the worst luck</b>. I (N) cannot <i>possibly</i> find the words to express that sentiment enough. If hardships were metals, you wouldnâ€™t be able to see him beneath all the ones he keeps getting tossed onto him. Iâ€™ve personally never met someone who has had to live with life giving them crummy deals year after year, as much as C.</p><p>I couldnâ€™t make him cupcakes, or a special dinner. We donâ€™t have a working phone, so he couldnâ€™t get in contact with his family at all. All of the stores nearby were also without power and the busses werenâ€™t running, so we couldnâ€™t even go get him something. And without heat, he spent the entire time worried about our gecko.</p><p><b>Please send him in happy birthday wishes!</b></p><p>Now that the power is back Iâ€™m (N) hoping to throw him a REAL birthday. Post id: 636056740942708736
Date: Sat, 28 Nov 2020 11:16:17
Post url: https://randomreasonstolive.tumblr.com/post/636056740942708736/a-plea-for-help
Slug: a-plea-for-help
Reblog key: sXAF2HLH
Reblog url: https://randomreasonstolive.tumblr.com/post/635694053727584257/a-plea-for-help
Reblog name: randomreasonstolive
Title: A Plea for Help
<p><a href="https://randomreasonstolive.tumblr.com/post/631250046552309760/a-plea-for-help" class="tumblr_blog">randomreasonstolive</a>:</p><blockquote>
<p>Hello there you beautiful, shining stars,</p>
<p>For those of you who are new, our names are C and N and we are the admins of this blog!</p>
<p>We are a disabled queer couple and have been together ten years as of the end of October. Weâ€™ve got three cats, a stubborn doggo, and two crested geckos!</p>
<p>C and I have been hit hard by the pandemic, like most people have been in the USA (where we come from). Weâ€™ve been doing everything we can to make the stimulus money we were given last, but as we get into winter, itâ€™s run out. Weâ€™re not sure if there will be another one, and when it could be, and weâ€™re concerned we wonâ€™t be able to make it much longer. On top of that, our apartment building is increasing itâ€™s rent in December by another $50, when we canâ€™t afford the current price.</p>
<p>C had been trying to find a local job, but Câ€™s immune system is compromised and both of us were scared that he would catch it. Andâ€¦ <b>he did</b>. Now weâ€™re both dealing with covid on top of other struggles and itâ€™s justâ€¦ itâ€™s a lot.</p>
<p>Asking yâ€™all for help is something we usually avoid doing, because the idea of monetizing this blog hurts our hearts. But we also know we need to be able to admit when weâ€™re in need.</p>

<p>C had been trying to find a local job, but Câ€™s immune system is compromised and both of us were scared that he would catch it. Andâ€¦ <b>he did</b>. Now weâ€™re both dealing with covid on top of other struggles and itâ€™s justâ€¦ itâ€™s a lot.</p>
<p>Asking yâ€™all for help is something we usually avoid doing, because the idea of monetizing this blog hurts our hearts. But we also know we need to be able to admit when weâ€™re in need.</p>

<p>C and I have been hit hard by the pandemic, like most people have been in the USA (where we come from). Weâ€™ve been doing everything we can to make the stimulus money we were given last, but as we get into winter, itâ€™s run out. Weâ€™re not sure if there will be another one, and when it could be, and weâ€™re concerned we wonâ€™t be able to make it much longer. On top of that, our apartment building is increasing itâ€™s rent in December by another $50, when we canâ€™t afford the current price.</p>
<p>C had been trying to find a local job, but Câ€™s immune system is compromised and both of us were scared that he would catch it. Andâ€¦ <b>he did</b>. Now weâ€™re both dealing with covid on top of other struggles and itâ€™s justâ€¦ itâ€™s a lot.</p>
<p>Asking yâ€™all for help is something we usually avoid doing, because the idea of monetizing this blog hurts our hearts. But we also know we need to be able to admit when weâ€™re in need.</p>
<p>Andâ€¦ <b>weâ€™re in need of help, loves.</b></p>
<p>If youâ€™d like to directly donate to us, <b>our paypal is</b>: teamcibby@gmail.com</p>
<p>If youâ€™d prefer to get something for your donation,<b> I sell art commissions </b>on my art tumblr,Â <a href="https://tiny-pastel-unicorn.tumblr.com/">https://tiny-pastel-unicorn.tumblr.com/</a>Â You can see my <b>examples for said art here</b>:Â <a href="https://sta.sh/21f0h7yv2y9b">https://sta.sh/21f0h7yv2y9b</a></p>
<p>We also have an<b> amazon wishlist</b> if youâ€™d prefer that:Â <a href="https://www.amazon.com/hz/wishlist/ls/16FH3EUB5XMPN?ref_=wl_share">https://www.amazon.com/hz/wishlist/ls/16FH3EUB5XMPN?ref_=wl_share</a></p>
<p>Any amount of help is greatly appreciated.Â </p>
<p>

If yâ€™all could justâ€¦ see the energy C puts into this blogâ€¦ he spends night after night, when he could be playing Minecraft or watching Bailey Sarian, filling up the queue and making sure it lasts. Because he doesnâ€™t want yâ€™all to come on tumblr, hoping to see a reason, only for the queue to be empty. He puts that above himself on a daily basis.<br/></p>
<p>We sincerely appreciate what yâ€™all have done for our blog and us in the past, in the present, and we know we will appreciate anything in the future. Without all of you and your support, we would have been lost a long, long time ago.</p>
<p>We love you all so much and we hope your October goes well~</p>
<p>- N</p>

<p>C had been trying to find a local job, but Câ€™s immune system is compromised and both of us were scared that he would catch it. Andâ€¦ <b>he did</b>. Now weâ€™re both dealing with covid on top of other struggles and itâ€™s justâ€¦ itâ€™s a lot.</p>
<p>Asking yâ€™all for help is something we usually avoid doing, because the idea of monetizing this blog hurts our hearts. But we also know we need to be able to admit when weâ€™re in need.</p>

Title: A Plea for Help
<p><a href="https://randomreasonstolive.tumblr.com/post/631250046552309760/a-plea-for-help" class="tumblr_blog">randomreasonstolive</a>:</p><blockquote>
<p>Hello there you beautiful, shining stars,</p>
<p>For those of you who are new, our names are C and N and we are the admins of this blog!</p>
<p>We are a disabled queer couple and have been together ten years as of the end of October. Weâ€™ve got three cats, a stubborn doggo, and two crested geckos!</p>
<p>C and I have been hit hard by the pandemic, like most people have been in the USA (where we come from). Weâ€™ve been doing everything we can to make the stimulus money we were given last, but as we get into winter, itâ€™s run out. Weâ€™re not sure if there will be another one, and when it could be, and weâ€™re concerned we wonâ€™t be able to make it much longer. On top of that, our apartment building is increasing itâ€™s rent in December by another $50, when we canâ€™t afford the current price.</p>
<p>C had been trying to find a local job, but Câ€™s immune system is compromised and both of us were scared that he would catch it. Andâ€¦ <b>he did</b>. Now weâ€™re both dealing with covid on top of other struggles and itâ€™s justâ€¦ itâ€™s a lot.</p>
<p>Asking yâ€™all for help is something we usually avoid doing, because the idea of monetizing this blog hurts our hearts. But we also know we need to be able to admit when weâ€™re in need.</p>
<p>Andâ€¦ <b>weâ€™re in need of help, loves.</b></p>
<p>If youâ€™d like to directly donate to us, <b>our paypal is</b>: teamcibby@gmail.com</p>
<p>If youâ€™d prefer to get something for your donation,<b> I sell art commissions </b>on my art tumblr,Â <a href="https://tiny-pastel-unicorn.tumblr.com/">https://tiny-pastel-unicorn.tumblr.com/</a>Â You can see my <b>examples for said art here</b>:Â <a href="https://sta.sh/21f0h7yv2y9b">https://sta.sh/21f0h7yv2y9b</a></p>
<p>We also have an<b> amazon wishlist</b> if youâ€™d prefer that:Â <a href="https://www.amazon.com/hz/wishlist/ls/16FH3EUB5XMPN?ref_=wl_share">https://www.amazon.com/hz/wishlist/ls/16FH3EUB5XMPN?ref_=wl_share</a></p>
<p>Any amount of help is greatly appreciated.Â </p>
<p>

If yâ€™all could justâ€¦ see the energy C puts into this blogâ€¦ he spends night after night, when he could be playing Minecraft or watching Bailey Sarian, filling up the queue and making sure it lasts. Because he doesnâ€™t want yâ€™all to come on tumblr, hoping to see a reason, only for the queue to be empty. He puts that above himself on a daily basis.<br/></p>
<p>We sincerely appreciate what yâ€™all have done for our blog and us in the past, in the present, and we know we will appreciate anything in the future. Without all of you and your support, we would have been lost a long, long time ago.</p>
<p>We love you all so much and we hope your October goes well~</p>
<p>- N</p>

Title: A Plea for Help

<p>Hello there you beautiful, shining stars,</p>
<p>For those of you who are new, our names are C and N and we are the admins of this blog!</p>
<p>We are a disabled queer couple and have been together ten years as of the end of October. Weâ€™ve got three cats, a stubborn doggo, and two crested geckos!</p>
<p>C and I have been hit hard by the pandemic, like most people have been in the USA (where we come from). Weâ€™ve been doing everything we can to make the stimulus money we were given last, but as we get into winter, itâ€™s run out. Weâ€™re not sure if there will be another one, and when it could be, and weâ€™re concerned we wonâ€™t be able to make it much longer. On top of that, our apartment building is increasing itâ€™s rent in December by another $50, when we canâ€™t afford the current price.</p>
<p>C had been trying to find a local job, but Câ€™s immune system is compromised and both of us were scared that he would catch it. Andâ€¦ <b>he did</b>. Now weâ€™re both dealing with covid on top of other struggles and itâ€™s justâ€¦ itâ€™s a lot.</p>
<p>Asking yâ€™all for help is something we usually avoid doing, because the idea of monetizing this blog hurts our hearts. But we also know we need to be able to admit when weâ€™re in need.</p>
<p>Andâ€¦ <b>weâ€™re in need of help, loves.</b></p>

Title: A Plea for Help
<p><a href="https://randomreasonstolive.tumblr.com/post/631250046552309760/a-plea-for-help" class="tumblr_blog">randomreasonstolive</a>:</p><blockquote>
<p>Hello there you beautiful, shining stars,</p>
<p>For those of you who are new, our names are C and N and we are the admins of this blog!</p>
<p>We are a disabled queer couple and have been together ten years as of the end of October. Weâ€™ve got three cats, a stubborn doggo, and two crested geckos!</p>
<p>C and I have been hit hard by the pandemic, like most people have been in the USA (where we come from). Weâ€™ve been doing everything we can to make the stimulus money we were given last, but as we get into winter, itâ€™s run out. Weâ€™re not sure if there will be another one, and when it could be, and weâ€™re concerned we wonâ€™t be able to make it much longer. On top of that, our apartment building is increasing itâ€™s rent in December by another $50, when we canâ€™t afford the current price.</p>
<p>C had been trying to find a local job, but Câ€™s immune system is compromised and both of us were scared that he would catch it. Andâ€¦ <b>he did</b>. Now weâ€™re both dealing with covid on top of other struggles and itâ€™s justâ€¦ itâ€™s a lot.</p>
<p>Asking yâ€™all for help is something we usually avoid doing, because the idea of monetizing this blog hurts our hearts. But we also know we need to be able to admit when weâ€™re in need.</p>
<p>Andâ€¦ <b>weâ€™re in need of help, loves.</b></p>
<p>If youâ€™d like to directly donate to us, <b>our paypal is</b>: teamcibby@gmail.com</p>
<p>If youâ€™d prefer to get something for your donation,<b> I sell art commissions </b>on my art tumblr,Â <a href="https://tiny-pastel-unicorn.tumblr.com/">https://tiny-pastel-unicorn.tumblr.com/</a>Â You can see my <b>examples for said art here</b>:Â <a href="https://sta.sh/21f0h7yv2y9b">https://sta.sh/21f0h7yv2y9b</a></p>
<p>We also have an<b> amazon wishlist</b> if youâ€™d prefer that:Â <a href="https://www.amazon.com/hz/wishlist/ls/16FH3EUB5XMPN?ref_=wl_share">https://www.amazon.com/hz/wishlist/ls/16FH3EUB5XMPN?ref_=wl_share</a></p>
<p>Any amount of help is greatly appreciated.Â </p>
<p>

If yâ€™all could justâ€¦ see the energy C puts into this blogâ€¦ he spends night after night, when he could be playing Minecraft or watching Bailey Sarian, filling up the queue and making sure it lasts. Because he doesnâ€™t want yâ€™all to come on tumblr, hoping to see a reason, only for the queue to be empty. He puts that above himself on a daily basis.<br/></p>
<p>We sincerely appreciate what yâ€™all have done for our blog and us in the past, in the present, and we know we will appreciate anything in the future. Without all of you and your support, we would have been lost a long, long time ago.</p>
<p>We love you all so much and we hope your October goes well~</p>
<p>- N</p>

<p>For those of you who are new, our names are C and N and we are the admins of this blog!</p>
<p>We are a disabled queer couple and have been together ten years as of the end of October. Weâ€™ve got three cats, a stubborn doggo, and two crested geckos!</p>
<p>C and I have been hit hard by the pandemic, like most people have been in the USA (where we come from). Weâ€™ve been doing everything we can to make the stimulus money we were given last, but as we get into winter, itâ€™s run out. Weâ€™re not sure if there will be another one, and when it could be, and weâ€™re concerned we wonâ€™t be able to make it much longer. On top of that, our apartment building is increasing itâ€™s rent in December by another $50, when we canâ€™t afford the current price.</p>
<p>C had been trying to find a local job, but Câ€™s immune system is compromised and both of us were scared that he would catch it. Andâ€¦ <b>he did</b>. Now weâ€™re both dealing with covid on top of other struggles and itâ€™s justâ€¦ itâ€™s a lot.</p>
<p>Asking yâ€™all for help is something we usually avoid doing, because the idea of monetizing this blog hurts our hearts. But we also know we need to be able to admit when weâ€™re in need.</p>
<p>Andâ€¦ <b>weâ€™re in need of help, loves.</b></p>
<p>If youâ€™d like to directly donate to us, <b>our paypal is</b>: teamcibby@gmail.com</p>

Title: A Plea for Help
<p><a href="https://randomreasonstolive.tumblr.com/post/631250046552309760/a-plea-for-help" class="tumblr_blog">randomreasonstolive</a>:</p><blockquote>
<p>Hello there you beautiful, shining stars,</p>
<p>For those of you who are new, our names are C and N and we are the admins of this blog!</p>
<p>We are a disabled queer couple and have been together ten years as of the end of October. Weâ€™ve got three cats, a stubborn doggo, and two crested geckos!</p>
<p>C and I have been hit hard by the pandemic, like most people have been in the USA (where we come from). Weâ€™ve been doing everything we can to make the stimulus money we were given last, but as we get into winter, itâ€™s run out. Weâ€™re not sure if there will be another one, and when it could be, and weâ€™re concerned we wonâ€™t be able to make it much longer. On top of that, our apartment building is increasing itâ€™s rent in December by another $50, when we canâ€™t afford the current price.</p>
<p>C had been trying to find a local job, but Câ€™s immune system is compromised and both of us were scared that he would catch it. Andâ€¦ <b>he did</b>. Now weâ€™re both dealing with covid on top of other struggles and itâ€™s justâ€¦ itâ€™s a lot.</p>
<p>Asking yâ€™all for help is something we usually avoid doing, because the idea of monetizing this blog hurts our hearts. But we also know we need to be able to admit when weâ€™re in need.</p>
<p>Andâ€¦ <b>weâ€™re in need of help, loves.</b></p>
<p>If youâ€™d like to directly donate to us, <b>our paypal is</b>: teamcibby@gmail.com</p>
<p>If youâ€™d prefer to get something for your donation,<b> I sell art commissions </b>on my art tumblr,Â <a href="https://tiny-pastel-unicorn.tumblr.com/">https://tiny-pastel-unicorn.tumblr.com/</a>Â You can see my <b>examples for said art here</b>:Â <a href="https://sta.sh/21f0h7yv2y9b">https://sta.sh/21f0h7yv2y9b</a></p>
<p>We also have an<b> amazon wishlist</b> if youâ€™d prefer that:Â <a href="https://www.amazon.com/hz/wishlist/ls/16FH3EUB5XMPN?ref_=wl_share">https://www.amazon.com/hz/wishlist/ls/16FH3EUB5XMPN?ref_=wl_share</a></p>
<p>Any amount of help is greatly appreciated.Â </p>
<p>

If yâ€™all could justâ€¦ see the energy C puts into this blogâ€¦ he spends night after night, when he could be playing Minecraft or watching Bailey Sarian, filling up the queue and making sure it lasts. Because he doesnâ€™t want yâ€™all to come on tumblr, hoping to see a reason, only for the queue to be empty. He puts that above himself on a daily basis.<br/></p>
<p>We sincerely appreciate what yâ€™all have done for our blog and us in the past, in the present, and we know we will appreciate anything in the future. Without all of you and your support, we would have been lost a long, long time ago.</p>
<p>We love you all so much and we hope your October goes well~</p>
<p>- N</p>

<p>We are a disabled queer couple and have been together ten years as of the end of October. Weâ€™ve got three cats, a stubborn doggo, and two crested geckos!</p>
<p>C and I have been hit hard by the pandemic, like most people have been in the USA (where we come from). Weâ€™ve been doing everything we can to make the stimulus money we were given last, but as we get into winter, itâ€™s run out. Weâ€™re not sure if there will be another one, and when it could be, and weâ€™re concerned we wonâ€™t be able to make it much longer. On top of that, our apartment building is increasing itâ€™s rent in December by another $50, when we canâ€™t afford the current price.</p>
<p>C had been trying to find a local job, but Câ€™s immune system is compromised and both of us were scared that he would catch it. Andâ€¦ <b>he did</b>. Now weâ€™re both dealing with covid on top of other struggles and itâ€™s justâ€¦ itâ€™s a lot.</p>
<p>Asking yâ€™all for help is something we usually avoid doing, because the idea of monetizing this blog hurts our hearts. But we also know we need to be able to admit when weâ€™re in need.</p>
<p>Andâ€¦ <b>weâ€™re in need of help, loves.</b></p>
<p>If youâ€™d like to directly donate to us, <b>our paypal is</b>: teamcibby@gmail.com</p>

Reblog name: randomreasonstolive
Title: A Plea for Help
<p><a href="https://randomreasonstolive.tumblr.com/post/631250046552309760/a-plea-for-help" class="tumblr_blog">randomreasonstolive</a>:</p>
<blockquote>
<p>Hello there you beautiful, shining stars,</p>
<p>For those of you who are new, our names are C and N and we are the admins of this blog!</p>
<p>We are a disabled queer couple and have been together ten years as of the end of October. Weâ€™ve got three cats, a stubborn doggo, and two crested geckos!</p>
<p>C and I have been hit hard by the pandemic, like most people have been in the USA (where we come from). Weâ€™ve been doing everything we can to make the stimulus money we were given last, but as we get into winter, itâ€™s run out. Weâ€™re not sure if there will be another one, and when it could be, and weâ€™re concerned we wonâ€™t be able to make it much longer. On top of that, our apartment building is increasing itâ€™s rent in December by another $50, when we canâ€™t afford the current price.</p>
<p>C had been trying to find a local job, but Câ€™s immune system is compromised and both of us were scared that he would catch it. Andâ€¦ <b>he did</b>. Now weâ€™re both dealing with covid on top of other struggles and itâ€™s justâ€¦ itâ€™s a lot.</p>
<p>Asking yâ€™all for help is something we usually avoid doing, because the idea of monetizing this blog hurts our hearts. But we also know we need to be able to admit when weâ€™re in need.</p>
<p>Andâ€¦ <b>weâ€™re in need of help, loves.</b></p>
<p>If youâ€™d like to directly donate to us, <b>our paypal is</b>: teamcibby@gmail.com</p>
<p>If youâ€™d prefer to get something for your donation,<b> I sell art commissions </b>on my art tumblr,Â <a href="https://tiny-pastel-unicorn.tumblr.com/">https://tiny-pastel-unicorn.tumblr.com/</a>Â You can see my <b>examples for said art here</b>:Â <a href="https://sta.sh/21f0h7yv2y9b">https://sta.sh/21f0h7yv2y9b</a></p>
<p>We also have an<b> amazon wishlist</b> if youâ€™d prefer that:Â <a href="https://www.amazon.com/hz/wishlist/ls/16FH3EUB5XMPN?ref_=wl_share">https://www.amazon.com/hz/wishlist/ls/16FH3EUB5XMPN?ref_=wl_share</a></p>
<p>Any amount of help is greatly appreciated.Â </p>
<p>

If yâ€™all could justâ€¦ see the energy C puts into this blogâ€¦ he spends night after night, when he could be playing Minecraft or watching Bailey Sarian, filling up the queue and making sure it lasts. Because he doesnâ€™t want yâ€™all to come on tumblr, hoping to see a reason, only for the queue to be empty. He puts that above himself on a daily basis.<br/></p>
<p>We sincerely appreciate what yâ€™all have done for our blog and us in the past, in the present, and we know we will appreciate anything in the future. Without all of you and your support, we would have been lost a long, long time ago.</p>
<p>We love you all so much and we hope your October goes well~</p>
<p>- N</p>

Title: A Plea for Help
<p><a href="https://randomreasonstolive.tumblr.com/post/631250046552309760/a-plea-for-help" class="tumblr_blog">randomreasonstolive</a>:</p><blockquote>
<p>Hello there you beautiful, shining stars,</p>
<p>For those of you who are new, our names are C and N and we are the admins of this blog!</p>
<p>We are a disabled queer couple and have been together ten years as of the end of October. Weâ€™ve got three cats, a stubborn doggo, and two crested geckos!</p>
<p>C and I have been hit hard by the pandemic, like most people have been in the USA (where we come from). Weâ€™ve been doing everything we can to make the stimulus money we were given last, but as we get into winter, itâ€™s run out. Weâ€™re not sure if there will be another one, and when it could be, and weâ€™re concerned we wonâ€™t be able to make it much longer. On top of that, our apartment building is increasing itâ€™s rent in December by another $50, when we canâ€™t afford the current price.</p>
<p>C had been trying to find a local job, but Câ€™s immune system is compromised and both of us were scared that he would catch it. Andâ€¦ <b>he did</b>. Now weâ€™re both dealing with covid on top of other struggles and itâ€™s justâ€¦ itâ€™s a lot.</p>
<p>Asking yâ€™all for help is something we usually avoid doing, because the idea of monetizing this blog hurts our hearts. But we also know we need to be able to admit when weâ€™re in need.</p>
<p>Andâ€¦ <b>weâ€™re in need of help, loves.</b></p>
<p>If youâ€™d like to directly donate to us, <b>our paypal is</b>: teamcibby@gmail.com</p>
<p>If youâ€™d prefer to get something for your donation,<b> I sell art commissions </b>on my art tumblr,Â <a href="https://tiny-pastel-unicorn.tumblr.com/">https://tiny-pastel-unicorn.tumblr.com/</a>Â You can see my <b>examples for said art here</b>:Â <a href="https://sta.sh/21f0h7yv2y9b">https://sta.sh/21f0h7yv2y9b</a></p>
<p>We also have an<b> amazon wishlist</b> if youâ€™d prefer that:Â <a href="https://www.amazon.com/hz/wishlist/ls/16FH3EUB5XMPN?ref_=wl_share">https://www.amazon.com/hz/wishlist/ls/16FH3EUB5XMPN?ref_=wl_share</a></p>
<p>Any amount of help is greatly appreciated.Â </p>
<p>

If yâ€™all could justâ€¦ see the energy C puts into this blogâ€¦ he spends night after night, when he could be playing Minecraft or watching Bailey Sarian, filling up the queue and making sure it lasts. Because he doesnâ€™t want yâ€™all to come on tumblr, hoping to see a reason, only for the queue to be empty. He puts that above himself on a daily basis.<br/></p>
<p>We sincerely appreciate what yâ€™all have done for our blog and us in the past, in the present, and we know we will appreciate anything in the future. Without all of you and your support, we would have been lost a long, long time ago.</p>
<p>We love you all so much and we hope your October goes well~</p>

Title: A Plea for Help
<p>Hello there you beautiful, shining stars,</p><p>For those of you who are new, our names are C and N and we are the admins of this blog!</p><p>We are a disabled queer couple and have been together ten years as of the end of October. Weâ€™ve been doing everything we can to make the stimulus money we were given last, but as we get into winter, itâ€™s run out. Weâ€™re not sure if there will be another one, and when it could be, and weâ€™re concerned we wonâ€™t be able to make it much longer. On top of that, our apartment building is increasing itâ€™s rent in December by another $50, when we canâ€™t afford the current price.</p><p>C had been trying to find a local job, but Câ€™s immune system is compromised and both of us were scared that he would catch it.
